1.title: Little Family, Big Fears

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: As new parents, Penny and Joe struggle to keep it together as Penny's first surgery approaches. A family trip to pumpkin patch provides a welcome distraction, but fear sets in again on the night before surgery.

2.title: Penny's Surgery

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: It's the day of Penny's spinal decompression surgery and Terra and Joe are on edge as they head to the hospital.

3.title: Penny Comes Home

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Joe attempts to surprise Terra for Penny's homecoming after surgery, but an early release from the hospital could derail his plans.

4.title: Baby Fever

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Tensions are high as Terra confronts Tonya about not visiting Penny while in the hospital. Terra presses Joe on having another baby, but doesn't receive the response she's hoping for.

5.title: Joe's Daddy Daycare

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Terra is in charge of Traci's baby shower, which leaves Joe in charge of Penny for the first time.

6.title: Music Video Mayhem

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Terra works to expand her brand by releasing a children's album, and she wants Joe to be a part of the video shoot.

7.title: We're Going Camping!

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: With Penny's health continuing to improve, Joe plans a camping trip to get away for a few nights alone with Terra.

8.title: Not So Happy Camper

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Terra and Joe are camping for two days while nanny Olevia watches Penny. Terra struggles with being away from Penny for the first time, and the trip gets cut short when nanny Olevia stops answering their phone calls.

9.title: Put Your Back Into It

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: After finally convincing Joe to start trying for a second child, Terra puts a plan in place for him to finally start taking his back pain seriously, starting with yoga.

10.title: Let's Make a Deal

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Terra schedules a live performance to promote her album of children's music and enlists Joe and Tonya to perform with her.

11.title: Exciting News

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Terra has exciting news to tell Joe, but she's nervous that he'll be upset with her for sharing the information with her friends first.

12.title: Signs of Trouble

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Joe receives a cortisone shot in an attempt to put off an invasive back surgery. Terra worries she may be having some medical issues.

1.title: Big Risk, Little Baby

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Terra and Joe are given some troubling news regarding their unborn child's health. As a result, Terra undergoes an MRI and other medical tests. Because of the results and the high risk of a little person pregnancy, the doctor makes a surprising decision about Terra's due date.

2.title: The Proposal

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: With Terra's due date moved up by over a week, it's crunch time preparing for the baby's arrival. Terra pleads with her mom to fly out for the baby's birth, but receives some disappointing news. Meanwhile, Joe is making some plans of his own and decides to finally ask Terra to marry him--will she say yes?

3.title: Everything Is Not Okay

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Terra reunites with her besties Traci and Tonya to tell them about Joe's big proposal. Terra and Joe try their hardest to get everything in order before the baby arrives, but when a very pregnant Terra realizes they're not totally ready for the baby, she has a break down.

4.title: The Final Countdown

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Tonya gives Terra some mommy advice to ease her nerves. With the final countdown upon them, Joe and Terra celebrate their last night alone together and anticipate how their lives will change as they set off on their new journey as parents.

5.title: Little Baby, Big World

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Terra experiences one final meltdown in the hospital room before she is moved to the O.R. and surgery begins. Terra is immediately separated from the baby who is rushed to the NICU for treatment. While Terra recovers in the hospital, the baby's name is finally decided.

6.title: A First for Everything

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: In a series of firsts, Terra and Joe adjust to their life with the baby at home. The new little parents are exhausted and together they face many challenges, from breastfeeding to giving the baby her first bath. Joe and Terra also take the baby to her first pediatrician appointment to help understand the challenges their daughter may face.

7.title: It Takes a Family

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Terra worries about having to take Penny to see a neurologist and struggles with her new role as Mom. Joe hopes a visit from his cousin Sonny will lend a helping hand, but after their task to buy a car becomes an afternoon at the bar, Terra realizes she may need professional help.

8.title: Work It!

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Terra still doesn't fit into any of her pre-maternity clothes and convinces Joe to make a get-fit pact. While working out, Joe reflects on all the surgeries he endured as a child and hopes Penny's impending genetics test results won't reveal a similar fate.

9.title: Penny's Little Party

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Terra and Joe receive the long-awaited news of Penny's genetic test results. The exhausted new parents prepare for a Sip n' See party they're hosting for friends to meet Penny. Will the main topic of conversation end up being about their baby or the guest who wasn't invited?

10.title: Daddy Daycare

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The pressure is on Joe to succeed at his first Mother's Day. He wants to pamper Terra, but that isn't his only challenge. Penny requires 24-hour care and an exhausted Terra begs Joe to watch Penny all by himself for the afternoon. Will this Mother's Day be one to remember, or one that sends Joe to the doghouse?

11.title: A Family Affair

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Joe's family visits and Terra storms off from a family dinner when the conversation escalates into a heated debate about religion and how they plan to raise Penny. Tension remains between Terra and Joe during their first family photo shoot and tears are shed when Joe and his mom have a heart-to-heart about Joe's deceased father.

12.title: Safety First

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Terra and Joe are startled by some troubling news about their neighborhood and decide it's time to amp up home security. Terra rallies for the dogs to return home and Joe purchases a weapon without consulting Terra. Meanwhile, Terra and Joe struggle with a difficult medical decision as Penny's vaccination appointment nears.

13.title: Ready or Not, Here We Come

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Terra's brother Bourn comes to visit and the absence of Terra's mom is more noticeable than ever. The new parents try to enjoy a night out, but concern over Bourn's babysitting skills cuts dinner short. The three scheme a way for Terra's mom to finally meet Penny and decide on an impromptu trip to Texas, but Grandma is not one for surprises.

14.title: Surprise!

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Terra's mom hates surprises, but that hasn't stopped Terra and Joe from taking Penny to Texas for an unannounced visit. The family celebrates Penny's one-month birthday and a thunderstorm forces Grandma to abruptly leave the party and tend to her dogs. Terra is left disappointed and wondering if her mom will even make it to the upcoming wedding.

15.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family Up Close & Personal

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: This one-hour special features interviews with the stars, Terra and Joe, and takes a look back at the most exciting moments from the season.

16.title: Out of the Frying Pan, Into the Fire

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Terra gets herself ready for romance while she struggles with Joe to set a date for the wedding.

17.title: In Over My Head

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Terra and Joe's wedding planning has just gotten into full swing when the couple receives some unexpected news about their daughter Penny's health.

18.title: Fools Rush In

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Joe struggles to physically keep up with Terra as she scrambles to pull off their last minute wedding. Will their new wedding planner save the day or will the new couple be forced to realize their dream of a summer wedding is unrealistic?

19.title: Welcome to the Club

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Joe's MRI reveals a frightening prognosis for his future and Terra stresses over finally having to announce who her Maid of Honor will be without ruining any friendships.

20.title: Sweet Home Chicago

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: The little family arrives in Chicago with lots of emotional baggage. Their wedding day is just 10 days away and the to-do list is growing quickly. Terra and Joe's relationship is put to the ultimate test under the pressures of last minute wedding planning.

21.title: Forgive and Forget

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Can Terra and Joe put aside their hurt feelings and get the wedding train back on track? A visit to Joe's father's grave puts life back in perspective and Joe tries to prove to Terra that he cares about the wedding, but will his efforts be enough?

22.title: You're Leaving Me?

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Penny is baptized just before her Parents head out for a night of sin--their bachelor and bachelorette parties. Joe drops a bomb on Terra that leaves her in tears.

23.title: With or WIthout You

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Terra attends her wedding rehearsal without Joe, who is in another state playing a gig with his band. Her bridesmaids and her brother offer lots of support, but when Joe's return flight is delayed just hours before their wedding Terra is distraught. Will the lightning storm keep Joe from making it to his own wedding?

24.title: Change of Plans

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: After Joe leaves Terra alone in Chicago to play a gig with his band two days before their wedding, Terra questions if he's really ready for marriage. Will Joe's last minute surprise change Terra's mind or has he gone too far this time?

25.title: Mother May I?

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Terra tries to enjoy her wedding day, but with so many last minute demands it's difficult. Tonya convinces Joe that it's not too late to ask Terra's mom for her blessing on their marriage, but once a nervous Joe works up the courage to ask her, he gets an unexpected response.

26.title: Meet the Gnoffo's

episode of.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: It's been a life-changing year for the Little Family and it culminates in a beautiful exchange of vows in front of Terra's and Joe's best friends and family in Joe's hometown of Chicago.

imdb.title: Little Women: Terra's Little Family
akas: Little Women: Terra's Little Family (United States)
plot: Terra, from Little women LA, documents her first pregnancy with her daughter.::Blaire K
